rows.label: qst702401_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, Lieutenant Veronica.
How are things?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0002
rows.name: Adel-sama?! What are you doing here?!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0003
rows.name: After what happened in the capital...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0004
rows.name:
I thought there might be some
unrest in the resistance.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0005
rows.name: Well... we have a bit of a problem...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0006
rows.name: A problem?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0007
rows.name:
Since the Heaven's Holy Grail's attack
on the capital, there's been no end
to those leaving the resistance.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0008
rows.name:
Just a moment ago, another one came
to me saying he wanted to leave the
army and go back to his country...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0009
rows.name:
It makes me want to ask them just
who this "resistance" is for.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0010
rows.name:
No... it can't be helped. Metsu
showed them such immense power.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0011
rows.name:
It's natural to be afraid, and it
would be cruel to hold them back...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0012
rows.name: So, how many have we lost, exactly?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0013
rows.name:
Four from the front lines
and two from the base
garrison, for a total of six.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0014
rows.name:
I'd like to secure more personnel
as soon as possible, but with
the situation as it is...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0015
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0016
rows.name:
Alright! In that case, we'll go
and recruit some volunteers!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0017
rows.name:
N-no! I can't ask Adel-sama
to do something like that!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0018
rows.name:
It's fine. I've been leaving
the resistance matters to
you too much anyway.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0019
rows.name:
I want to show everyone a
bit of my leadership side.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0020
rows.name: I understand. If you insist...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0021
rows.name: So, what kind of people do you want?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0022
rows.name:
Let's see... I'd like
someone with high morale.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0023
rows.name:
Morale? Not someone
skilled or intelligent?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0024
rows.name: In peacetime, those would be important.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0025
rows.name:
But now, we have to face
an overwhelming power like
the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0026
rows.name:
Right now, toughness that won't
give in to such a situation
is what's most important.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0027
rows.name:
True... That's why so
many have been leaving.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0028
rows.name:
However, as an army, we also value
discipline to be recognized both
internally and externally.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0029
rows.name:
No matter how spirited, someone
who lacks cooperation cannot be
accepted into an organization.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0030
rows.name:
I understand. So we're looking
for people with "high morale"
and "cooperation".

rows.label: qst702401_msg0031
rows.name:
Yes. If you go to the capital,
there should still be people who
want to join the resistance.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0032
rows.name: Yes, leave it to us!
